name: The Entity Within
description:
EARLY ACCESS DEVELOPMENT (ALPHA STATE)



A game that will have a lot of content over time, from new maps, new entities, new challenges, Steam Workshop, Achievements and Leaderboards, join the fog of entities and escape as soon as possible.
This game has a great journey ahead of it and you can help its evolution, the community is always heard.

THE ENTITY WITHIN


Realms between 1980-2020, you are the test of something divine that got you stuck with an entity.
Will you wait and die? Does death help you escape?
Your objective is to find 3 fuses that are inside 6 randomly generated boxes. Each fuse must go to the end fog door. But don't forget, you are not alone, be silent with your movements, entities do not forgive.
Each map has an estimated time for the completion of the match, if you find the fuses within the time you will be rewarded with money, which will allow you to buy new items to make the game more challenging or easier.

THE ENTITIES

Each entity has its specific power, some with cons others that take away hope from survivors.

Aggressive Entity:
- These entities kill the survivor in a single attack, but on the other hand it is very easy to detect where they walk, their steps are audible enough.
- Some entities can speed up the survivor's heartbeat, which also indicates that they are nearby.

Stealth Entity:
- These entities make almost no noise when walking or cause a fast heartbeat.
- These entities by themselves are weaker, being able to kill the survivor after two attacks.

Special Entity:
- Some entities may have some "Chosen Effect", which may cause deafness or blindness to the entity.
- Despite having a huge disadvantage against the survivor, they are much more aggressive than other entities

THE SURVIVOR

You are your best help.
Calculate all your movements, buy custom items you will be able to have a better vision, a help to find the fuses, the entity or even curses that can delay your speedrun.
